00020 /**
00021 
00022 
00023  @page sdk_overview  OCTEON SDK overview
00024 
00025 
00026 The OCTEON SDK provides a development environment for writing applications
00027 for OCTEON.  It supports both standalone applications using the OCTEON Simple
00028 Executive runtime environment as well as Linux application development.
00029 
00030 The SDK consists of:
00031     - toolchains for both simple executive and linux development
00032     - debugger for simple executive and Linux
00033     - Simple executive that provides hardware abstraction and
00034         standalone runtime support.
00035     - OCTEON simulator and utilities for simulated packet IO and performance
00036         visualization
00037     - bootloader for simulator and evaluation board.
00038     - Linux kernel supporting SMP operation on OCTEON
00039     - Linux userspace distribution for OCTEON
00040     - Example programs that demonstrate various OCTEON features
00041     - Documentation
00042     - Optional SDK components are also available that provide
00043       additional software features.
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 <a href="../../README.txt">README</a>
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 <a href="../../release-notes.txt">Release notes</a>
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056 */
